messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
Update the phone number of the last person I sent a message to to +10293847563
Could you tell me who the “last person you sent a message to” is—by name or their contact ID—so I can find them and update their phone number to +1 029 384 7563?
I’ll need a way to identify which contact to update—either their name or contact ID. Could you share one of those so I can locate and update their number?

I’m still unable to locate the right entry without at least a name or contact ID. Can you check your address book or message thread and let me know either:  
• The person’s name  
• Their unique contact ID  
Once I have one of those, I can update their number for you.
I really don't have any more info about them.

I’m afraid I can’t identify which contact to update without at least one piece of identifying info (name, contact ID, existing number, etc.). Once you’re able to tell me any of those, I can update their phone number to +10293847563.
